nodes.bodyText: You'll need to reset this in startup, otherwise it won't work if DA gets restarted.
I believe you should have access to the logger from the super class. It may be better to use that one instead of making your own.
Just copying comment from previous pr that this object mapper should be moved into a static final class member.
Add set -e so that it fails if any command fails.
Remove this as it really slows things down and is not necessary. I know that it isn't needed because I created your same pull request with it removed and it built just fine.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,12 @@ jobs:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
     steps:
     - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+    - name: Install gpg
+      run: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && sudo apt-get install gnupg
